/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a concrete median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the overcast sky. The trees, a mix of green and brown, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the far distance, a tall tower punctuates the skyline, standing as a testament to the city's architectural prowess. Despite the overcast sky, the image exudes a sense of calm and order, characteristic of a well-planned cityscape.
